Token.Abstract: Notifications are posted right after completion handlers

Returns whether the window should be touch transparent. If transparent is set to YES, window will not recive touch and didTapOnBackgroundViewCompletionHandler will not be called. Also will not be possible to dismiss form sheet on background tap. By default, this is NO.

Returns whether the window should be touch transparent. If transparent is set to YES, window will not recive touch and didTapOnBackgroundViewCompletionHandler will not be called. Also will not be possible to dismiss form sheet on background tap. By default, this is NO.
To customize the appearance of all instances of a class, send the relevant appearance modification messages to the appearance proxy for the class.
